name: Vorely Demo
description:
WARNING: Vorely is a vore-based series! While it doesn't show nudity or the like, it's still 18+ Only!

Welcome to the Vorely Demo! Vorely is a series of games made by FurAffinity artist unfortunatelyAlive, customized for commissioners! This demo gives the basic parts of a Vorely game: dialogue, sprites, and choices. 

Also customizable:
- Dialogue boxes
- Sprite and Background Style

For more information, go to https://www.furaffinity.net/user/unfortunatelyalive/ !
